content.name: bottle
content.label: Bottle
content.gloss: a container that can contain water

content.name: normal_bottle
content.label: Normal Bottle
content.gloss: a container that can contain water (normal type )

content.name: jug
content.label: Jug
content.gloss: a large container for liquids, with a narrow mouth and typically a stopper or cap

content.name: body
content.label: Body
content.gloss: the main part of the bottle

content.name: lid
content.label: Lid
content.gloss: a removable or hinged cover for the top of a container

content.name: lid_handle
content.label: Lid Handle
content.gloss: the part on lid by which a thing is held, carried, or controlled

content.name: body_handle
content.label: Body Handle
content.gloss: the part of the bottle/jug by which a thing is held, carried, or controlled

content.name: neck
content.label: Neck
content.gloss: neck part below the closure or sloping part between neck and body

content.name: closure
content.label: Closure
content.gloss: a cork or screwcap on the top of the bottle

content.name: containing_things
content.label: Stuff contained
content.gloss: the containing things, such as liquid, in the bottle

content.name: mouth
content.label: Mouth
content.gloss: a mouth-like part through which the water or containing liquid can be poured or squeezed out
